Name: Cucumber Spritz
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Copa glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig & cucumber zest.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Cucumber, elderflower and grassy Sauvignon Blanc wine combine as a trio of summery flavours in this light and refreshing cocktail.
History: Recipe created in 2017 by Tony Conigliaro. Our Spritz page contains information on the history of, and other recipes for, the Spritz family of cocktails.
Nutrition: One serving of Cucumber Spritz contains 101 calories
